parts.text: {"word":"stab","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(ナイフなどで)刺す、突き刺す","english_definition":"to push a knife or other sharp object into someone or something.","examples":[{"sentence":"He stabbed her in the back with a knife.","translation":"彼はナイフで彼女の背中を刺した。"},{"sentence":"She stabbed the meat with a fork.","translation":"彼女はフォークで肉を刺した。"},{"sentence":"The thief stabbed the security guard.","translation":"泥棒は警備員を刺した。"}],"collocations":["stab someone in the back (人の背中を刺す、裏切る)","stab with a knife (ナイフで刺す)","stab repeatedly (何度も刺す)"],"synonyms":["pierce","puncture","gore","lance","skewer"],"antonyms":["protect","defend","shield"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(ナイフなどで)刺す、突き刺す","english_definition":"to make a thrusting stroke with a knife or other sharp object.","examples":[{"sentence":"He stabbed wildly at the attacker.","translation":"彼はむやみに攻撃者を刺した。"},{"sentence":"She stabbed at the air in frustration.","translation":"彼女は苛立ちから空を刺した。"}],"collocations":["stab at (～を刺す)","stab wildly (むやみに刺す)"],"synonyms":["thrust","jab","poke"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"刺すこと、突き刺し、刺し傷","english_definition":"an act of stabbing someone or something; a wound caused by stabbing.","examples":[{"sentence":"He died from a stab wound to the chest.","translation":"彼は胸の刺し傷が原因で死亡した。"},{"sentence":"The victim received multiple stabs.","translation":"被害者は複数箇所を刺された。"},{"sentence":"She felt a stab of pain in her leg.","translation":"彼女は脚にズキッとした痛みを感じた。"}],"collocations":["stab wound (刺し傷)","stab in the back (裏切り)","a stab of pain (ズキッとした痛み)","multiple stabs (複数回の刺し)"],"synonyms":["thrust","jab","puncture","wound"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(比喩的に)突然の激しい感情、衝撃","english_definition":"a sudden sharp feeling or pain.","examples":[{"sentence":"She felt a stab of jealousy when she saw him with another woman.","translation":"彼が別の女性と一緒にいるのを見て、彼女は激しい嫉妬を感じた。"},{"sentence":"He felt a stab of guilt for what he had done.","translation":"彼は自分のしたことに対して激しい罪悪感を感じた。"}],"collocations":["a stab of jealousy (激しい嫉妬)","a stab of guilt (激しい罪悪感)","a stab of remorse (激しい後悔)","a stab of fear (激しい恐怖)"],"synonyms":["pang","twinge","surge","flash"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(略式)試み、努力","english_definition":"(informal) an attempt.","examples":[{"sentence":"I'll have a stab at fixing the car.","translation":"その車の修理を試みてみよう。"},{"sentence":"Let me have a stab at answering the question.","translation":"その質問に答えるのを試させてください。"}],"collocations":["have a stab at (～を試みる)","take a stab at (～を試みる)"],"synonyms":["attempt","try","effort","shot (informal)","go (informal)"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"13世紀初頭に遡る。「突き刺す、刺す」という意味の古フランス語の「estaber」から派生。さらに遡ると、俗ラテン語の「*stappāre」（突き刺す、刺す）に由来する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/stæb/","syllables":"stab"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["stab","stabs"],"past_simple":"stabbed","past_participle":"stabbed","present_participle":"stabbing"},"noun_plural":"stabs"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**stab**」は、物理的にナイフなどの鋭利なもので刺す行為、またはその結果生じる傷を指す言葉です。比喩的には、裏切り行為や、突然の強い感情を表すこともあります。また、インフォーマルな文脈では、何かを試みるという意味でも使われます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He stabbled her.","correct":"✓ He stabbed her.","note":"「stab」の過去形、過去分詞は「stabbed」です。"},{\"incorrect\":\"✗ I felt a stabing of pain.\",\"correct\":\"✓ I felt a stab of pain.\",\"note\":\"名詞として使う場合、通常 'stabing' ではなく 'stab' を使います。\"}],\"priority\":\"★★☆\"},\"related_words\":{\"derivatives\":[\"stabber (名詞: 刺す人)\",\"stabbing (名詞: 刺すこと、刺傷事件)\"],\"idioms_phrases\":[\"stab someone in the back (人の背中を刺す、裏切る)\"],\"priority\":\"★★★\"},\"level_frequency\":{\"CEFR\":\"B2\",\"frequency_google_ngram\":\"比較的頻繁 (Relatively frequent)\",\"priority\":\"★☆☆\"},\"readability_explanation\":{\"level\":\"B2\",\"text\":\"「**stab**」は、ナイフのような鋭いもので「刺す」という意味の動詞および名詞です。物理的な行為だけでなく、「裏切る」という意味で使われることもあります。例えば、「He stabbed me in the back.（彼は私を裏切った）」のように使います。また、名詞としては、「a stab of pain（ズキッとした痛み）」のように、感情や感覚が急に襲ってくる様子を表すこともあります。インフォーマルな場面では、「試みる」という意味で使われることもあります。\"},\"example_sentences\":[{\"sentence\":\"The attacker **stabbed** the victim multiple times.\",\"translation\":\"攻撃者は被害者を何度も刺した。\",\"type\":\"verb (vt)\",\"meaning_category\":\"刺す\"},{\"sentence\":\"She received a **stab** wound in the arm.\",\"translation\":\"彼女は腕に刺し傷を負った。\",\"type\":\"noun\",\"meaning_category\":\"刺し傷\"},{\"sentence\":\"He felt a **stab** of remorse for his actions.\",\"translation\":\"彼は自分の行動に対して激しい後悔の念を感じた。\",\"type\":\"noun\",\"meaning_category\":\"激しい感情\"},{\"sentence\":\"I'll have a **stab** at fixing the computer.\",\"translation\":\"そのコンピューターの修理を試みてみよう。\",\"type\":\"noun\",\"meaning_category\":\"試み\"},{\"sentence\":\"Don't **stab** me in the back!\",\"translation\":\"私を裏切らないで！\",\"type\":\"verb (figurative)\",\"meaning_category\":\"裏切る\"}]}
